title: Citi Turns to Google Cloud to Update Digital Strategy
text: Citi has teamed with Google to use artificial intelligence (AI) and cloud technology to bolster its digital strategy. The collaboration, announced Monday (Oct. 28), is designed to use Google Cloud's expertise to upgrade the banking giant's infrastructure.

title: Meta Reportedly Takes on Google With AI-Powered Search
text: Meta is reportedly creating an artificial intelligence-powered search engine to lower dependence on Google. The tech giant's web crawler would be able to offer conversational answers to queries about current events on Meta AI, Reuters reported Monday (Oct. 28), citing a paywalled article by The Information.

title: Alphabet Bulls Charge Ahead Of Q3: Will Meta's AI Search, DOJ Roadblocks Change The Game?

title: Alphabet's Earnings Could Surprise—Should You Buy Now?
text: Alphabet NASDAQ: GOOGL has underperformed most of the "Magnificent 7" stocks this year, with shares up just 18.31% YTD, only outperforming Microsoft and Tesla.
